decisions.description:
The main goal of this flow is to create an Event ( a type of Activity ). But we must create that Event within an existing record.
If all previous attempts at finding a record failed ( via SFID, or Invitee Email ): then we need to create a record.
We will always create a Lead when we couldn't find a record.
decisions.name: Do_we_have_a_Record
decisions.label: Do we have a Record?

decisions.description:
While looking up the records, if we found one, we would have set the OwnerId as the record owner.
In the last step, we attempted to overwrite the OwnerId with the id of the user whose email matches the publisher.
So at this point, we hope to have an owner defined. If we don't we'll have to look up the system admin.
decisions.name: Event_Owner
decisions.label: Event Owner?

decisions.description: We cannot update a converted lead. If the lead is converted, we need to try and find the contact it was converted to.
decisions.name: Is_it_Converted
decisions.label: Is it Converted?

decisions.description:
If we cannot find the system admin profile, we cannot find the system admin. And if we're at this point in the logic, we have no other owner.
So there's no path forward if the profile is not found.
decisions.name: Profile_Found
decisions.label: Profile Found?

decisions.name: Service_you_are_interested_to_hear_more_of
decisions.label: Service you are interested to hear more of:

rightValue.stringValue: Service you are interested to hear more of:

decisions.description: So there's no path forward if the system admin is not found.
decisions.name: User_Found
decisions.label: User Found?

recordLookups.description: This lookup with find the converted contact, or set RecordId to null since the converted lead cannot be updated.
recordLookups.name: Find_Converted_Contact
recordLookups.label: Find Converted Contact

subflows.description: After creating the Event, we now will add Additional Guests and hosts to it.
subflows.name: Create_Event_Attendee_Template
subflows.label: Create Event Attendee Template
